We have some key feature updates for you :

- Now you can get 100% refund on your hotel booking cancellation till 2 pm one day before check-in
- You can now book your holiday package on app
- We have made some performance improvements to make your experience better

We have another great update for you. Here are the key highlights of the release –
 
1)      We have reduced the time it takes to launch the App. We know it was a pain to wait for the app to load and we have worked really hard to make it fast.
2)      We have fixed a lot of bugs and improved performance all around.

For any feedback, write to us at mobilefeedback@makemytrip.com

We have great new update for you. You should update the app right away but if you are still thinking, here are things you will get in this update -

1) Now enjoy our brand new feature where we will intimate you as fares for your flights go down.

2) A much better experience when you select your hotel room, so that you can make better choices using the App

3) A better experience choosing your holiday packages with more details that will surely help you in making choices

4) Now you can use codes to claim My Wallet credits from the Refer and Earn program

5) We have improved our Help & Support section further so that you have a smoother experience when you run into issues

6) A beautiful new experience when you want to cancel your flights using the App.. we know plans can change all the time..

Why read this, when you already know we’re working hard to make your travel experience better – one app version at a time. Still keen on reading? Ok, here are some of the things we think you’ll like in this version
1) Booking failed or airline could not confirm your seat? Don’t wait for the tedious refund process, now just pay the difference and book another flight
2) Experience Holiday search results in a new listing screen
3) Along the way we’ve quashed a bunch of bugs that have been bothering you (and us!)

Why read this, when you already know we’re working hard to make your travel experience better – one app version at a time. Still keen on reading? Ok, here are some of the things we think you’ll like in this version:
 
1) Reviews are important before booking, we know! So we’re adding more of it.

In this new & improved version we’ve baked in several small and large delighters. Here’s a quick highlight –
1.       You can now purchase meals on your flight at a much discounted price than in flight.
2.       You can now use your existing gift cards during a booking!
3.       We’ve added the ability to send you personalized offers for your flight or hotel booking.
4.       And plenty of minor improvements across the app. Download the app to find out more !

Wonder why most app updates say bug fixes nearly every time? That’s because we’re pushing ourselves to give you the easiest flight, hotel, holiday, bus and train booking experience. Additionally, here’s what we’ve done.
1. See your wallet balance when searching for flights so you’ll know how much extra discount you can get from your wallet money.
2. We’ve made it easier for you to view holiday packages. We know you’ll like these!
3. Enhancements to our Help & Support section.

Greetings dear traveller. The second release of the year from MakeMyTrip brings to you a more powerful travel app in your hands. This update brings  to you the following:
1)      A more optimized referral flow to bring in your near and dear ones.
2)      A lightning quick hotel listing page.
3)      Support for EMI options for big ticket items.
4)      And a ton of under the hood fixes to make your travel experience more awesome.

Greetings dear traveller. This release from MakeMyTrip has Some exciting new features.
 
Introducing “MMT Assured”, a brand new hotel category that offers awesome rooms, great service and 24x7 hotline in case you face any issues at the hotel. Great Experience Guaranteed!
 
Adding to that is the easy sale discovery of flights on the homepage itself. And a ton of under the hood fixes to make your travel experience more awesome.
 
If you love our free app, please do take a moment to rate us in the app store.

We’re constantly working to make your travel booking simple, reliable and secure.
Updates -
1.Get all details about a hotel in one quick glance in our newly designed Details page.
2.You can now do part cancellation of your flight tickets directly on the app. Simply select the passenger name and mode of refund and done. It’s that simple.
3.Change in travel plans? No problems. Simply opt-in for our Cancellation Assurance during the booking and we’ve got you covered!
4.Announcing the launch of MyTrip Contacts! Enroll into the program and earn rewards every time whenever your contacts travel.

MakeMyTrip is a simple, fast and secure way to book international/domestic hotels and flights. In this fresh update we’ve taken this goal a notch higher.
1.       Simpler Than Ever Before: We’ll pre-apply your wallet money to reduce the hotel prices even further. We’ve also made sure you never miss another airline sale – discover it right on the Home Page!
2.       Faster Than Ever Before: We’ve made hotel searches fast and snappy. Try it out for yourself!

MakeMyTrip is a simple, fast and secure way to book international/domestic hotels and flights. In this fresh update we’ve taken this goal a notch higher.
1.       Simpler Than Ever Before: We’ll pre-apply your wallet money to reduce the hotel prices even further. We’ve also made sure you never miss another airline sale – discover it right on the Home Page!
2.       Faster Than Ever Before: We’ve made hotel searches fast and snappy. Try it out for yourself!

Our teams have been working very hard despite the running cricket T20 season. But now that the season is up, we are quite pleased to tell you that we have a great new update! You should the update the app ASAP but if you are interested in knowing what all we have shipped, please find the details below –
 - Enjoy the benefit of being able to track your Flight booking refunds with ease, right from within the app. Now, there’s no need to call up our call center or keep checking your email for flight refund updates.
- We have launched a new feature called “Zero Cancellation” for Domestic Flight bookings. Enjoy ZERO penalty and get a full refund, in case you wish to cancel the booking later by opting for this option. This feature is available on select airlines.
-  CITI bank customers – Now get rid of the hassle on entering payment OTP on the bank page. You can easily make your booking on the app by entering the OTP on our mobile friendly OTP page.
-  Lots of performance optimizations and under the hood fixes

This Diwali we’re making hotel & flight booking easier, faster and simpler.
1.       Introducing MMT Promise – We delay. We pay. If you’ve cancelled a flight or hotel booked on MMT, we’ll make a promise to you by when you’ll get your money back. If we delay, then we pay you more per hour for the delay.
2.       You’ll now be able to book multiple room types in a single booking. If you are travelling as a large group, this is just what you were looking for.
3.       Check out our new and refreshed design when you book your next hotel stay.

Happy New Year Travelers! Here are some of the things we think you’ll like in this version
1.      With this release you can book your hotels now & pay later (available on select hotels).
2.      Looking for additional options in your hotel purchase? You can now purchase Add-Ons inside the app!
3.      From this release onwards, you can track every request you make with MakeMyTrip inside the MyRequests section, available inside the Help Section.
4.      Do you travel only on Window seats on flights? You can now select your seats while booking the airline ticket!  
5.      And finally, you can customize hotels while selecting your holiday package on MakeMyTrip.

Have you taken the most important trip of the year yet?
Yes, of course, we are talking about the trip to the vaccination centre :) Now you can book a slot for the Vaccination Wala Trip on the MakeMyTrip app, for yourself and your family.
And if you’ve had already made the trip to the vaccination centre, you can link your and your family’s vaccination certificates to your MakeMyTrip account and get set to travel! Wish you a happy journey.

Hey, how are you holding up? The last few weeks may have been hard, so we have sent out a few things into the universe that will help :) These are:
 
A silent prayer for the health of your loved ones & you.
 
With our new app update, we launched Trip Ideas of the Week bringing you new collections of exciting, offbeat, and topical ideas for your next trip. So now you know what’s the perfect thing to browse when you’re all cooped up in your comforter!
 
A non-cancellation wish so that your friends do not cancel the next travel plan you make.
 
A Makeover for Your Favourite Holiday Packages: With our new app update, you can now customize your holiday packages the way you like, and also view the summary of the complete package before you pay.
 
And finally, a prayer to the Sun God to appear more often, these chilly days need a fix!
 
It’s only getting better from here onwards 
Team MakeMyTrip

Deviyon aur sajjano, apni kursi ki peti bandh lijiye, ’coz now your fav travel app is available in Hindi too! 
Update (or install) & get set to make flight bookings (or cancellations) in your preferred language.
 
What’s more in this update, you ask?
You can also list your Apartment/House or just a room in your home in 15 minutes, for our over 50 million+ customers to explore and book it—and you can earn big! 

Get, set, go!
